Evacuate.en: Evacuate {vessel} and refill with inert gas {evacuations} times, using a vacuum pressure of {vacuum_pressure}, waiting {after_vacuum_wait_time} after evacuating and {after_inert_gas_wait_time} after refilling with inert gas
Evacuate.ru: Вакуумировать и заполнить инертным газом {vessel} {evacuations} раз.
